content:
The Secura Jewelry Armoire is a popular choice, and it's essential to ensure it fits comfortably in your space.

According to the product description, the Secura Jewelry Armoire has the following dimensions:

* Height: 47.2 inches (120 cm)
* Width: 17.7 inches (45 cm)
* Depth: 11.8 inches (30 cm)

Please note that these dimensions may vary slightly depending on the specific model or version you're interested in, so it's always a good idea to double-check the product page or manufacturer's website for the most up-to-date information.

If you're still unsure, you can also consider the following:

* Measure the space where you plan to place the armoire to ensure it fits comfortably.
* Check the product reviews to see what other customers have to say about the size and whether it fits in their spaces.
* Consider the style and design of your room; if you have a lot of large furniture pieces, you might want a smaller armoire.

If you're still unsure, feel free to ask me more questions or explore other options that might fit your space better!
